channel.title: Animation on Anthony Whitford
channel.description: Recent content in Animation on Anthony Whitford

item.title: Animated Text Kit
item.description: Animated Text Kit is a Flutter package that contains a collection of some cool and awesome text animations: Colorize Fade Rotate Scale TextLiquidFill Typer Typewriter Wavy I am a collaborator on this project and contribute changes that help make this project better.
